name: Hopper's Dunk
description:
Just tap tap to dunk.

A unique basketball game that will put your skills.
How much can you score ?
Hop Hop Dunk is a burning hot arcade game that anybody can enjoy!

Features:

- 27+ Balls & traps
- High Scores (compete with others)
- Endless gameplay
- FUN and SHARE with your friends

How To Play:

Tap your finger on the device to make the basketball go up. Tap the correct amount of times to make the basketball go through the hoop. Do this as much as you can to get the high score and be #1.

Collect skins and achieve crazy challenges.
